Key Arguments: The legislation erodes freedom of speech.
Politicians have been the greatest purveyors of misinformation, especially during COVID-19 lockdowns.
The bill is against democratic rights and human rights.
Concerns about who will enforce the misinformation rules and how they will be chosen.
Questions whether belief systems and scientific theories could be labeled as misinformation under the bill.
Notable Quotes: I disapprove of what you say but I will defend to the death your right to say it.
The greatest purveyors of Misinformation and Disinformation were our politicians shown during the recent Covid 19 LOCKDOWNS etc.
This is totally against our Democratic Rights.
Australia is not a TOTALITARIAN COUNTRY - YET - Our current Prime Minister seems as though that is what he wants though.
